audioText: Ces designers urbains marient de façon évidente les styles moderne et traditionnel dans leur nouvel espace commercial downtown.
question: How do these urban designers combine different styles?
options: They obviously blend modern and traditional styles in their new commercial space
They carefully separate contemporary and classical elements
They exclusively use vintage materials and techniques
They focus only on minimalist and industrial designs
explanation: The text states 'Ces designers urbains marient de façon évidente les styles moderne et traditionnel dans leur nouvel espace commercial downtown' - These urban designers obviously blend modern and traditional styles in their new commercial space downtown. 'Marient' means 'marry/combine' (third person plural of 'marier').
